title: 2018 Kia Stinger is a balanced drifting machine on ice - Roadshow
text:
1 of 73 2018 Kia Stinger is a balanced drifting machine on ice 
To gain its winter weather driving stripes, Kia performed testing and development for the Stinger in Arjeplog, Sweden. Photo by: Kia Pricing is currently unavailable. 
Tuning for the anti-lock brakes, traction control, stability control and available all-wheel-drive system were the focus for Kia Sweden. Photo by: Kia Pricing is currently unavailable.
